project_description: I was on the development team for a web application named "Tutoring Slugs", which aimed to create a platform enabling students at the University of California, Santa Cruz find tutoring for any courses they were taking. The app ensured that the tutors had taken the courses prior to teaching, and had scored a grade higher than B+. The project used various technologies, and the team closely stuck to the principles of Agile during development

I created and published a Google Chrome extension which allows for the saving and viewing of YouTube videos and shorts in a simple list format. It allows for saving videos with custom names, deleting them, and navigating to any saved ones with a click.
